txt.en:
A barrage of flaming projectiles loosed by the Enemy's catapults has come crashing down into the First Circle of Minas Tirith, trapping the innocent and setting the city ablaze.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Douse flaming debris that has landed in Minas Tirith
* Rescue civilians trapped or lost within the flames
Douse flaming debris and rescue trapped civilians in Minas Tirith
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the hornblowers to alert reinforcements.</rgb>

A barrage of flaming projectiles loosed by the Enemy's catapults has come crashing down into the First Circle of Minas Tirith, trapping the innocent and setting the city ablaze. You must put out the fires and free the trapped civilians.
